Hi, My name is Towfiqul Islam. I am a full stack web developer from Dhaka, Bangladesh. I build clean and elegant websites.

How I Do It

I am flexible to work with any technologies based on the project. Following are the primary techs I have been working with past two years.

React

Apart from using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript with which I am very comfortable. For bigger project I use React.

NodeJS

For server side development I use NodeJS to build API.

MongoDB

My Current Database of choice is MongoDB. I also work with MySQL.

Adobe XD

I use Adobe XD to design my mockups.
